Articles.Content:
Just a short question, if I install a whole lot of planet packs, what effect will it have on inflight lag (fps), RAM usage, and loading time, both at the loading screen and transitioning to an inflight state?

I'm asking because I'm considering putting all of Interstellar Consortium, with visual mods, on one install and I was wondering if that would destroy my framerate.

Also, in case you need to know, I have 16 gigabytes of RAM, at any given time ~4 gigabytes are being used by other stuff, at least right now, so in effect I have 12 to run KSP with.
